title: 1996 Fenster zum Hof (window to the yard)

sources.title: FENSTER HOF
sources.description: Digitized video painting: April weather in the back yard: roofs, balconies, windows. View from a balcony window with excerpts from buildings in rhythmic blending technology of Canon Hi 8, assembled in the camera. Tribute to Siegfried Kracauer (LM)
